summary: A lawyer suffers a guilt complex after getting a murder acquittal for his client, and then finding out she did commit the crime.
cast: Angela Lansbury|Raymond Burr|Dick Foran|John Dehner|Lamont Johnson|Robert Griffin|Denver Pyle|Alex Sharp|Lee Miller|Madge Blake|Russell Thorson|Steve Carruthers|Dick Cherney|Russell Custer|Michael Jeffers|Frank Mills|Cliff Taylor
keywords: loading a gun|reel to reel tape recorder|black cat|thunderstorm|murder confession
title: Please Murder Me!
